trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> allows you to apply different methods to restore a file. You can choose to let the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_restore_wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> drive you through the restore process, or browse and search backups on your own.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> allows you to apply different methods to restore a file.

You can choose to let the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_restore_wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> drive you through the restore process, or browse and search backups on your own.

target.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> vous permet d'appliquer différentes méthodes de restauration de fichier.

Vous pouvez choisir de laisser l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_restore_wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> vous guider tout au long du processus de restauration, ou parcourir et rechercher les sauvegardes par vous-même.
